Description:
Senior EcologistKey Expertise Required:Applicant from Ecologist background on an international project along with MEA clients handling experience.
Critical Habitat Assessments CHA
ESIA, EIA, IFC, World Bank, IFI, Equator Principles
Natural capital, Biodiversity offsetting/Net Gain/Loss
Project management
Tender management and technical writing skills
Client interface and the ability to work within an international and local team.
From an Ecology background (at least 6 – 8 years in a very fast paced international consultancy environment)
Ideally KSA is preferred and international experience.
Ability to advise on and plan ecology aspects of environmental studies and tenders.Qualification:Bachelor’s degree in Ecologist or Zoology
Certification in relevant fieldJob Details
